<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Forceful Push](/Feats.aspx?ID=3371) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Attack" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=15" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 122</row>

**Archetype** [Spell Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=126)

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_mage hand_](/Spells.aspx?ID=177)

</column>

---

When you cast _mage hand_, you can modify its target to be 1 creature. If you do, replace its standard effects with the following: You push your foe telekinetically. Make a spell attack roll against the target's Fortitude DC. On a success, you [push](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) the target 5 feet away from you. On a critical success, you push the target 10 feet away from you.
